name: Free Hook
description:
Free yourself, others, and the land by using your trusty hookshot!

WASD - Movement / Hold SPACE to charge hook + release to let it fly!

Tips: You can move mid-air after landing the hook! You can also move while your hook is mid-flight! The hook IS also affected by gravity!

Trailer: 

100% Speedrun: (Can also use as a guide!)
